mutants.code:
def resolve_namespace_conflict(library_a, library_b, function_name):
    """
    Resolves namespace conflict in C++ using namespace aliasing, 'using' directive, or namespace specific calling.

    Args:
        library_a (str): The name of the first library.
        library_b (str): The name of the second library.
        function_name (str): The name of the conflicting function.

    Returns:
        str: A code snippet that resolves the namespace conflict.
    """
    namespace_aliasing = f'{library_a}_alias = {library_a};\n{library_a}_alias::{function_name}();\n{library_b}::{function_name}();'
    using_directive = f'using {library_a}::{function_name};\n{function_name}();\n{library_b}::{function_name}();'
    namespace_specific_calling = f'{library_a}::{function_name}();\n{library_b}::{function_name}();'
    code_snippet = f"// Resolve namespace conflict using namespace aliasing\n{namespace_aliasing}\n\n// Resolve namespace conflict using 'using' directive\n{using_directive}\n\n// Resolve namespace conflict using namespace specific calling\n{namespace_specific_calling}"
    return code_snippet

def resolve_namespace_conflict(library_a, library_b, function_name):
    """
    Resolves namespace conflict in C++ using namespace aliasing, 'using' directive, or namespace specific calling.

    Args:
        library_a (str): The name of the first library.
        library_b (str): The name of the second library.
        function_name (str): The name of the conflicting function.

    Returns:
        str: A code snippet that resolves the namespace conflict.
    """
    namespace_aliasing = f'namespace {library_a}{library_a};\n{library_a}_alias::{function_name}();\n{library_b}::{function_name}();'
    using_directive = f'using {library_a}::{function_name};\n{function_name}();\n{library_b}::{function_name}();'
    namespace_specific_calling = f'{library_a}::{function_name}();\n{library_b}::{function_name}();'
    code_snippet = f"// Resolve namespace conflict using namespace aliasing\n{namespace_aliasing}\n\n// Resolve namespace conflict using 'using' directive\n{using_directive}\n\n// Resolve namespace conflict using namespace specific calling\n{namespace_specific_calling}"
    return code_snippet
